descriptionSet.description: Ganesh Shankar Vidyarthi in the lap of Mother India who is sitting flanked by two groups of people, armed with sticks and other weapons. He was killed in 1931 while trying to pacify a riotous mob during the Kanpur riots. Two swords are sticking out of Mother India's chest and we can see Ganesh Vidyarthi's image above her too. In the background to the left buildings with domes can be seen while to the right temple-like buildings can be seen. The mobs of people behind Mother India are fighting with each other and towards the front they are looking towards Ganesh Vidyarthi. Some of them are wearing skull caps while others wear turbans.

inscription.text: HEART RENDERING EFFECT of HINDU MUSLIM RIOT AT CAWNPORE.
Kanpur ka danga Vidyarthi jo bharat mata ki godh mein Hindu-Muslim aekta ka shahid
Kanpur's riots Students who died in the lap of Mother India the martyrs of Hindu-Muslim unity publishers: Babulal Bhargav, Bagiya Maniram, Kanpur

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

description-en: Ganesh Shankar Vidyarthi in the lap of Mother India who is sitting flanked by two groups of people, armed with sticks and other weapons. He was killed in 1931 while trying to pacify a riotous mob during the Kanpur riots. Two swords are sticking out of Mother India's chest and we can see Ganesh Vidyarthi's image above her too. In the background to the left buildings with domes can be seen while to the right temple-like buildings can be seen. The mobs of people behind Mother India are fighting with each other and towards the front they are looking towards Ganesh Vidyarthi. Some of them are wearing skull caps while others wear turbans. (sp)
